TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit MethodDispatcherBase extends System.Object

Docs.summary: This class dispatches requests from the client to the interface/method of the remoted object. This class is used by remoting code generator.

Docs.param: The object impplemented the remoted interface.
Id of the method to which to dispatch the request to.
The body of the one-way message that needs to be dispatched to the object.
Docs.summary: This method is used to dispatch one way messages to the specified methodId of the interface implemented by the remoted object.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract System.Threading.Tasks.Task<object> DispatchAsync (object objectImplementation, int methodId, object requestBody, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<object> DispatchAsync(object objectImplementation, int32 methodId, object requestBody, valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed

Docs.param: The object impplemented the remoted interface.
Id of the method to which to dispatch the request to.
The body of the request object that needs to be dispatched to the object.
The cancellation token that will be signaled if this operation is cancelled.
Docs.summary: This method is used to dispatch request to the specified methodId of the interface implemented by the remoted object.
Docs.returns: A task that represents the outstanding asynchronous call to the implementation object. The return value of the task contains the returned value from the invoked method.
